title: Strategy Design for Recruitment and Retention of Rural and Remote Healthcare Workforce

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic healthcare systems, familiarity with community development concepts
context.additional_context: Blended classes centered on smartphone-based learning materials and field case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three key factors in successful cases of attracting rural healthcare personnel.
Teams can design a community-led strategy proposal for attracting healthcare personnel.
Learners can analyze actual medical job postings to evaluate effective recruitment strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
